data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Larkana, Sind, Pakistan to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Larkana, Sind, Pakistan
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 1,368 believers in Larkana against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Larkana, Sind, Pakistan that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Larkana, Sind, Pakistan to the gospel today.

Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Dahur (Muslim traditions) people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Dahur (Muslim traditions) people.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Larkana words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Father, help the 1,368 believers in Larkana to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.section_summary:
the county of Larkana, Sind, Pakistan has a population of 490,600.

We estimate Larkana has 1,368 people who might know Jesus, 4,906 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 484,326 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 358 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 1,368 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
